question:
Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from you house / flat.
Wirte a letter to your neighbours. In your letter
explain the reasons for the noise
apologise
describe what action you will take
text: I hope this letter finds you well. Let me introduce myself, my name is XXX. Our family received your letter last week, we were aware that noise might be made you feel uncomfort. We understood that this neighbourhood is a famous place for family life.

We would like to explain a bit of background about us. Our family is a newcomer from Japan in June 2011. Recently, we were just informed by the shipping company at the last minute, that our furniture and personal items need to be shipped to our house in 20 minutes. Thus, the delivery handymen  moved our things in a rush. Therefore, they made an unacceptable noise to our neighbours.

We are so sorry that our moving task was create problems for all of you.  We are fully aware of this issue, we will write a complaint letter to our shipping company about our neighbours' concern. Hence, we believe that this issue might not have happened again. Currently, we do not have any intention to move out from the Victoria area as we had visited at least ten sites. We found out there is no other neighbourhood that is better than Victoria.
I will arrange a buffet at my house this weekend. I hope I can see you all at my house to have a small gathering. Additionally, hope that you can accept my apologies.
